sys_widgets.name: Personal Expense Manager Summary

sys_update_version.name: sys_widgets_3abf36702ff2701051dad5f62799b680
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_widgets"><sys_widgets action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><name>Personal Expense Manager Summary</name><order>100</order><renderer/><renderer_type>javascript</renderer_type><roles/><script><![CDATA[function sections() {
    return {
        "Personal Expense Manager Summary": {
            "name": "x_0586_personal_ex.PersonalExpenseSummary"
        }
    };
}

function render() {
    var name = renderer.getPreferences().get("name");
    var gf = new GlideForm(renderer.getGC(), name, 0);
    gf.setDirect(true);
    gf.setRenderProperties(renderer.getRenderProperties());
    return gf.getRenderedPage();
}

function getEditLink() {
    var page = renderer.getPreference('name');
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_page');
    if (!gr.canWrite())
        return "";
    return "sys_ui_page.do?sysparm_query=name=" + page;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_widgets</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-22 14:18:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3abf36702ff2701051dad5f62799b680</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Personal Expense Manager Summary</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Personal Expense Manager" source="x_0586_personal_ex">ee83c8481bc000108ed631d7dc4bcbec</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Personal Expense Manager">ee83c8481bc000108ed631d7dc4bcbec</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_widgets_3abf36702ff2701051dad5f62799b680</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-22 14:56:01</sys_updated_on><top_level_category>false</top_level_category></sys_widgets></record_update>
